creditline: Bequest of John R. Van Derlip in memory of Ethel Morrison Van Derlip
description: Vase pedestal, five cylindrical stems supporting round shelves in lotus-flower shape, spring from inverted bulbous leaf with veinings and upcurling edges.  This in turn rests on ovoid base.  Base and lotus-shelves, deep red lacquer.  Leaf and stems, black lacquer, stems held together by metal band.  Lacquer peeling at back of one stem.
title: (Lotus-shaped vase pedestal)
